LanguageData.COAA_denyDistantSupplyJobsSetting_descri: Won't supply directly from a resource if hauling it to storage would bring it closer to the given blueprint. (Recommended with Mehni's Pick Up And Haul as only haul jobs utilize inventory.)
LanguageData.COAA_restockIndicatorSetting_description: Restock countdown for each settlement on world map (appears after trade).
LanguageData.COAA_defaultSearchIngredientRadiusSettin: New bills will be created with this radius.
LanguageData.COAA_pauseOnBeginAssaultSetting_descript: When a staged attack actually commences, not just appears.
LanguageData.COAA_scrollRestrictPawnsSetting_descript: Shift + scroll wheel on area restrictions will cycle them for all listed pawns (colonist or animal). Also recommended: VouLT's Better Pawn Control for policies.
LanguageData.COAA_convenientButcherRecipesSetting_des: Conserve freezer space with a <= 75 meat yielding creature recipe.
LanguageData.COAA_countableMeatRecipesSetting_descrip: Different recipes to count various combinations of animal, human, and insect.
LanguageData.COAA_separateCannibalMealsSetting_descri: Separate cannibal meals to avoid ingredient mixing (meals vanish if mod is unloaded).
LanguageData.COAA_separateInsectMealsSetting_descript: Separate insect meals to avoid ingredient mixing (meals vanish if mod is unloaded).
LanguageData.COAA_betterPawnControl_BirthSetting_desc: Hatched and birthed animals will inherit the entire restriction policy of their parent.
LanguageData.COAA_qualityBuilder_ForbiddenSetting_des: Patches a bug in Hatti's Quality Builder where the quality designation overwrites forbidden on game load.
